languages.text: "Думаете, шепотки нам что полезное скажут? Ха, сдается мне, и раньше от них пользы не было особой, и сейчас они скорее шутку сыграют, чем на выручку придут". {n}Идира каркающе смеется.{/n} "Ваша судьба, Лорд-капитан, только в ваших руках. Не дайте словам полоумной псайкерши вас смутить — вы птица не того полета, чтобы оглядываться на брюзжание из-за пелены".

"You think the little whisperers are going to play nice? Hah, they weren't that useful even before, and now they're more likely to mess us around than save our bacon." {n}Idira laughs ruefully.{/n} "Lord Captain, your fate is in your hands alone. Do not let the words of a deranged psyker confuse you — you're not meant to listen to the grumbling beyond the veil."
languages.original_text: "Думаете, шепотки нам что полезное скажут? Ха, сдается мне, и раньше от них пользы не было особой, и сейчас они скорее шутку сыграют, чем на выручку придут". {n}Идира каркающе смеется.{/n} "Ваша судьба, Лорд-капитан, только в ваших руках. Не дайте словам полоумной псайкерши вас смутить — вы птица не того полета, чтобы оглядываться на брюзжание из-за пелены".

traits.locale_text: "You think the little whispers are going to play nice? Hah, they were not that useful even before, and now they are more likely to prank us than to save our bacon." {n}Idira laughs ruefully.{/n} "Lord Captain, your fate is in your hands alone. Do not let the words of a deranged psyker confuse you, you are not the one to listen to the grumbling from behind the veil."

"You think the little whispers are going to play nice? Hah, they were not that useful even before, and now they are more likely to prank us than to save our bacon." {n}Idira laughs ruefully.{/n} "Lord Captain, your fate is in your hands alone. Do not let the words of a deranged psyker confuse you, you are not the one to listen to the grumbling from behind the veil."

"You think the little whisperers are going to play nice? Hah, they weren't that useful even before, and now they're more likely to mess us around than save our bacon." {n}Idira laughs ruefully.{/n} "Lord Captain, your fate is in your hands alone. Do not let the words of a deranged psyker confuse you — you're not meant to listen to the grumbling beyond the veil."

"You think the little whisperers are going to play nice? Hah, they weren't that useful even before, and now they're more likely to mess us around than save our bacon." {n}Idira laughs ruefully.{/n} "Lord Captain, your fate is in your hands alone. Do not let the words of a deranged psyker confuse you — you're not meant to listen to the grumbling beyond the veil."

"You think the little whisperers are going to play nice? Hah, they weren't that useful even before, and now they're more likely to mess us around than save our bacon." {n}Idira laughs ruefully.{/n} "Lord Captain, your fate is in your hands alone. Do not let the words of a deranged psyker confuse you — you're not meant to listen to the grumbling beyond the veil."

languages.text: “你以为这些小家伙会乖乖听话吗？哈，它们以前其实也没那么有用。到了这一步，说不定它们并不打算拯救我们，而是打算把我们耍得团团转。”{n}伊迪拉大笑起来，声音中充满了懊恼。{/n}“舰长大人，你的命运应该掌握在你自己手里。别让我这个灵能者的胡言乱语迷惑了你，你可不该听那些来自面纱后面的嘟囔声。”
languages.original_text: "You think the little whisperers are going to play nice? Hah, they weren't that useful even before, and now they're more likely to mess us around than save our bacon." {n}Idira laughs ruefully.{/n} "Lord Captain, your fate is in your hands alone. Do not let the words of a deranged psyker confuse you — you're not meant to listen to the grumbling beyond the veil."

traits.locale_text: “你以为这些小家伙会乖乖听话吗？哈，它们以前其实也没那么有用。到了这一步，说不定它们并不打算拯救我们，而是打算把我们耍得团团转。”{n}伊迪拉大笑起来，声音中充满了懊恼。{/n}“舰长大人，你的命运应该掌握在你自己手里。别让我这个灵能者的胡言乱语迷惑了你，你可不该听那些来自面纱后面的嘟囔声。”

languages.text: «¿Cree que mis susurros nos van a echar una mano? Ja. No eran muy útiles antes, pero ahora seguro que prefieren jugárnosla a ayudarnos». {n}Idira se ríe con amargura.{/n} «Lord Capitán, su destino está únicamente en sus manos. No deje que las palabras de una psíquica demente l{mf|e|a} confundan; nadie debería escuchar los reproches del otro lado del velo».
languages.original_text: "You think the little whisperers are going to play nice? Hah, they weren't that useful even before, and now they're more likely to mess us around than save our bacon." {n}Idira laughs ruefully.{/n} "Lord Captain, your fate is in your hands alone. Do not let the words of a deranged psyker confuse you — you're not meant to listen to the grumbling beyond the veil."

traits.locale_text: «¿Cree que mis susurros nos van a echar una mano? Ja. No eran muy útiles antes, pero ahora seguro que prefieren jugárnosla a ayudarnos». {n}Idira se ríe con amargura.{/n} «Lord Capitán, su destino está únicamente en sus manos. No deje que las palabras de una psíquica demente l{mf|e|a} confundan; nadie debería escuchar los reproches del otro lado del velo».

languages.text: 「ささやきが役に立ってくれるって思うの？まさか。以前もそんなには役に立たなかったし、窮地から救ってくれるより、混乱させられる可能性の方が高いわ」{n}イディラは悲しげに笑う。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、あなたの運命はその手に委ねられているわ。狂った異能者の言葉に惑わされてはだめよ。覆いの向こうの不平不満に耳を傾けてはいけない」
languages.original_text: "You think the little whisperers are going to play nice? Hah, they weren't that useful even before, and now they're more likely to mess us around than save our bacon." {n}Idira laughs ruefully.{/n} "Lord Captain, your fate is in your hands alone. Do not let the words of a deranged psyker confuse you — you're not meant to listen to the grumbling beyond the veil."

traits.locale_text: 「ささやきが役に立ってくれるって思うの？まさか。以前もそんなには役に立たなかったし、窮地から救ってくれるより、混乱させられる可能性の方が高いわ」{n}イディラは悲しげに笑う。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、あなたの運命はその手に委ねられているわ。狂った異能者の言葉に惑わされてはだめよ。覆いの向こうの不平不満に耳を傾けてはいけない」

languages.text: "Glaubt Ihr, die kleinen Flüsterer werden brav sein? Ha, sie waren schon vorher nicht sonderlich nützlich, und nun werden sie uns eher piesacken, als uns den Hintern zu retten." {n}Idira lacht reumütig auf.{/n} "Lord Captain, Euer Schicksal liegt allein in Euren Händen. Lasst Euch nicht von den Worten eines wahnsinnigen Psionikers verwirren. Ihr seid nicht dazu bestimmt, dem Gemurmel hinter dem Schleier zu lauschen."
languages.original_text: "You think the little whisperers are going to play nice? Hah, they weren't that useful even before, and now they're more likely to mess us around than save our bacon." {n}Idira laughs ruefully.{/n} "Lord Captain, your fate is in your hands alone. Do not let the words of a deranged psyker confuse you — you're not meant to listen to the grumbling beyond the veil."

traits.locale_text: "Glaubt Ihr, die kleinen Flüsterer werden brav sein? Ha, sie waren schon vorher nicht sonderlich nützlich, und nun werden sie uns eher piesacken, als uns den Hintern zu retten." {n}Idira lacht reumütig auf.{/n} "Lord Captain, Euer Schicksal liegt allein in Euren Händen. Lasst Euch nicht von den Worten eines wahnsinnigen Psionikers verwirren. Ihr seid nicht dazu bestimmt, dem Gemurmel hinter dem Schleier zu lauschen."

languages.text: « Vous croyez que les petits murmures se sont assagis ? Ma foi, ils n'étaient déjà pas bien utiles avant, et maintenant, ils risquent plus probablement de nous embrouiller que de nous sauver la mise, {n}dit-elle avec un rire sombre.{/n} {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, votre destin est entre vos seules mains. Ne laissez pas les divagations d'une psyker dérangée vous perturber, vous n'êtes pas {mf|censé|censée} écouter les grondements venus de l'autre côté du voile. »
languages.original_text: "You think the little whisperers are going to play nice? Hah, they weren't that useful even before, and now they're more likely to mess us around than save our bacon." {n}Idira laughs ruefully.{/n} "Lord Captain, your fate is in your hands alone. Do not let the words of a deranged psyker confuse you — you're not meant to listen to the grumbling beyond the veil."

traits.locale_text: « Vous croyez que les petits murmures se sont assagis ? Ma foi, ils n'étaient déjà pas bien utiles avant, et maintenant, ils risquent plus probablement de nous embrouiller que de nous sauver la mise, {n}dit-elle avec un rire sombre.{/n} {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, votre destin est entre vos seules mains. Ne laissez pas les divagations d'une psyker dérangée vous perturber, vous n'êtes pas {mf|censé|censée} écouter les grondements venus de l'autre côté du voile. »

languages.text: "Küçük fısıldayanlar, uslu uslu söz dinler mi sence? Eskiden de pek işe yaramıyorlardı ama şimdi postumuzu kurtarmaktansa bize oyunlar oynamayı yeğleyeceklerdir." {n}İdira kederle gülüyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, kaderin yalnızca kendi ellerinde. Dengesiz bir ruhsezerin sözlerinin kafanı karıştırmasına izin verme. Örtünün ardından gelen homurdanmalara kulak asmamalısın."
languages.original_text: "You think the little whisperers are going to play nice? Hah, they weren't that useful even before, and now they're more likely to mess us around than save our bacon." {n}Idira laughs ruefully.{/n} "Lord Captain, your fate is in your hands alone. Do not let the words of a deranged psyker confuse you — you're not meant to listen to the grumbling beyond the veil."
